definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: It is transformed into visible light image through optical correlator.
sentences.chinese: 它通過光學相關器轉換成可見光圖像信息。

sentences.english: The nebula was named after its resemblance to a dumbbell when seen in visible light.
sentences.chinese: 該星雲因在可見光下觀測其形似啞鈴而由此得名。

sentences.english: The optical images are from the Kitt Peak National Observatory in Arizona.
sentences.chinese: 可見光圖來自亞歷桑那基特峯國家天文臺。

sentences.english: Upconversion material can convert infrared radiation into visible light.
sentences.chinese: 使用上轉換材料可有效地將紅外射線轉換爲可見光。

sentences.english: All the above results suggest that the samples maybe possess visible-light degradation ability.
sentences.chinese: 以上的結果表明該樣品可能具有可見光催化性能。

sentences.english: Most of the invisibility cloaks that have been demonstrated to date conceal objects at frequencies that are not detectable by the human eye.
sentences.chinese: 大部分隱身斗篷都是在非可見光波段隱藏物體。

sentences.english: How does the blackbody spectrum of the sun compare to visible light?
sentences.chinese: 和可見光對比，太陽的黑體光譜是怎樣的？

sentences.english: Today, telescopes take pictures using forms of light hidden from the eye.
sentences.chinese: 如今，望遠鏡是用不可見光拍照的。

sentences.english: The ultraviolet light is then converted to visible light by phosphors on the surface of the discharge tube.
sentences.chinese: 紫外線通過放電管屏面上的熒光粉轉變成可見光。

sentences.english: A sodium chloride crystal is transparent to visible light.
sentences.chinese: 氯化鈉晶體對可見光透明。

sentences.english: A part of the invisible spectrum can be seen by the use of infrared technology.
sentences.chinese: 部分不可見光我們可以通過紅外線技術看到。

sentences.english: Study on the zero order reflection efficiency of subwavelength grating;
sentences.chinese: 研究亞波長光柵的可見光共振特性。

sentences.english: So optical radiation is just visible light energy spreading out.
sentences.chinese: 所以光輻射只是可見光釋放出的能量。

sentences.english: Identified about 25 years ago by radio waves, the ring cannot be seen in visible light.
sentences.chinese: 它最早於25年前被發現，其在可見光波段不可見。

sentences.english: And it makes the absorption peak of the exciton move to higher energy.
sentences.chinese: 並使激子吸收峯從紅外波段進入可見光波段。

sentences.english: This is because the wavelength of visible light is longer than 200 nanometres.
sentences.chinese: 因爲可見光的波長大於200納米。
